version.label: Version
version.comment: TurnTo version. Default is 4.3. Should be in the (major).(minor) form. Examples: 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, etc...

static_url.label: Static URL
static_url.comment: Default is http://static.www.turnto.com. Should not ever be changed, unless instructed by TurnTo.

url.label: URL
url.comment: Default is http://www.turnto.com. Should not ever be changed, unless instructed by TurnTo.

image_store_base.label: Image Store Base
image_store_base.comment: Default is wac.edgecastcdn.net/001A39/prod. Should not ever be changed, unless instructed by TurnTo.

static_cache_time.label: Static Content Cache Time
static_cache_time.comment: This setting only applies when using a Setup Type of Static Embed. Value is in seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes).

teaser_cache_time.label: Teaser Cache Time
teaser_cache_time.comment: The amount of time to cache the TurnTo teasers. Value is in seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes)

cc_display_cache_time.label: Checkout Chatter Display Widget Cache Time
cc_display_cache_time.comment: The amount of time to cache the Checkout Chatter Display Widget. Value is in seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes)

vcgallery_cache_time.label: Visual Content Gallery Widget Cache Time
vcgallery_cache_time.comment: The amount of time to cache the Visual Content Gallery Widget. Value is in seconds. Default is 900 (15 minutes)

skip_css_load.label: Skip CSS Load (while loading TurnTo on PDP)
skip_css_load.comment: Should the CSS load be skipped when loading TurnTo on PDP. Default is No.

checkoutcomments_enabled.label: Enabled Checkout Comments (on checkout confirmation page)

checkoutcomments_delivery_date_future.label: Future Delivery Date (in days)
checkoutcomments_delivery_date_future.comment: The number of days in the future to use as the delivery date. Ensures that items are actually delivered before Review Solicitation Emails are sent.

checkoutcomments_display_enabled.label: Enabled Checkout Comments Display Widget (on PDP)
checkoutcomments_display_enabled.comment:
You'll need to place the following code on your product details page in the position where you'd like the widget to appear:
<?php echo $this->getChildHtml('turnto_cc_pdp') ?>

cc_columns.label: Display Widget Columns
cc_columns.comment: Number of columns. Can be 1, 2, 3, 4, or Auto. 'Auto' detects the available width and chooses the best number of columns for you.

cc_rows_collapsed.label: Display Widget Rows in collapsed view
cc_rows_collapsed.comment: (default is 2) - Number of rows displayed after "Read all" is selected. This value should be less than rowsInExpandedView.

cc_rows_expanded.label: Display Widget Rows in expanded view
cc_rows_expanded.comment: (default is 10) - Number of rows displayed after "Read all" is selected.

cc_title.label: Display Widget Title
cc_title.comment: (default is "Why I Chose This:") - Title displayed at the top of the widget

cc_expand_text.label: Display Widget Expanded Text
cc_expand_text.comment: (default is "Read More") - Link label in top right corner for expanding the widget.

cc_collaped_text.label: Display Widget Collapsed Text
cc_collaped_text.comment: (default is "Read Less") - Link label in top right corner for collapsing the widget.

cc_pagination_prev_text.label: Display Widget Pagination 'Previous' Text
cc_pagination_prev_text.comment: (default is "Previous") - The label for the Previous link used in pagination

cc_pagination_next_text.label: Display Widget Pagination 'Next' Text
cc_pagination_next_text.comment: (default is "Next") - The label for the Next link used in pagination.

cc_minimum_comment_count.label: Display Widget Minimum Comment Count (hidden if less)
cc_minimum_comment_count.comment: (default is 4) - Minimum number of comments required to display widget. The widget is hidden if less than the minimum are available.

cc_minimum_comment_character_count.label: Display Widget Minimum Comment Character Count
cc_minimum_comment_character_count.comment: (default is 20) - Comments with less characters than this minimum will not be displayed or included in the counts.

cc_minimum_comment_word_count.label: Display Widget Minimum Comment Word Count
cc_minimum_comment_word_count.comment: (default is 3) - Comments with less words than this minimum will not be displayed or included in the counts.

cc_truncate_length.label: Display Widget Comment Truncate Length
cc_truncate_length.comment: (default is 200) - The text of the comment will be truncated to this length.

cc_include_syndicated.label: Display Widget Include Syndicated Comments
cc_include_syndicated.comment: (default is Yes) - Determines whether syndicated comments will be displayed in the widget. A syndicated comment is a comment that came from a source other than your website.

cc_sort_order.label: Display Widget Sort Order
cc_sort_order.comment: (default is "Most Recent") - "Most Recent" orders the comments from newest to oldest. "Longest" orders the comments from longest to shortest.

qa_teaser_custom.label: Custom Q&A teaser function definition
qa_teaser_custom.comment: Place custom javascript here to be used as the custom Q&A teaser function. Should be surrounded in a <script> tag

qa_teaser_custom_function_name.label: Custom Q&A teaser function name
qa_teaser_custom_function_name.comment: The name of the function defined in the "Custom Q&A teaser function code" field

reviews_teaser_custom.label: Custom reviews teaser function definition
reviews_teaser_custom.comment: Place custom javascript here to be used as the custom Reviews teaser function. Should be surrounded in a <script> tag

reviews_teaser_custom_function_name.label: Custom Reviews teaser function name
reviews_teaser_custom_function_name.comment: The name of the function defined in the "Custom reviews teaser function definition" field

vcgallery.label: Turnto Visual Content Gallery
vcgallery.comment: The Visual Content Gallery widget is displayed on the product details page.

vc_gallery_enabled.label: Enabled Visual Content Gallery Widget
vc_gallery_enabled.comment:
You'll need to place the following code on your product details page in the position where you'd like the widget to appear:
<?php echo $this->getChildHtml('turnto_vc_gallery') ?>

title.label: Title
title.comment: (default is "Customer Gallery") - Title displayed at the top of the widget

size.label: Size
size.comment: (default is small) - Widget display size. Options are 'large' and 'small'

modalSize.label: Modal Size
modalSize.comment: (default is Small) - The size of the modal detail view when the user clicks on the widget thumbnail. This configuration option is ignored on mobile views

showCaptionsInline.label: Show Captions Inline
showCaptionsInline.comment: (default is false) - Sets whether captions display below widget thumbnails

truncateLength.label: Truncate Length
truncateLength.comment: (default value is 40) - max length of caption text characters to display. ends with ellipsis (...)

minimumContentCount.label: Minimum Content Count
minimumContentCount.comment: (default value is 1) - Hide the widget unless there are this many visual content items to display

minimumTextContentCharacterCount.label: Minimum Text Content Character Count
minimumTextContentCharacterCount.comment: (default value is 0) - Only show media items with this many characters or more in the caption

minimumTextContentWordCount.label: Minimum Text Content Word Count
minimumTextContentWordCount.comment: (default value is 0) - Only show media items with this many words or more in the caption

sortOrder.label: Sort Order
sortOrder.comment: 'Most Votes' sorts by the most upvotes, 'Most Recent' sorts by the the comment creation date descending, 'Longest' sorts by the longest caption first

vcpinboard.label: Turnto Visual Content Pinboard
vcpinboard.comment: The Visual Content Pinboard is located: <basedir>/pinboard/visualcontent

title.label: Title
title.comment: (default is "Customer Comments") - Title displayed at the top of the widget

skus.label: SKUs
skus.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more SKU(s) and/or Category(ies); Must be set as a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['category1','sku1','sku2']

brands.label: Brands
brands.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more brand(s); Must be a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['brand1']

tags.label: Tags
tags.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more tag code(s); Must be a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['tagcode1','tagcode2']

activeOnly.label: Active Only
activeOnly.comment: (default is No) - Only returns content for active products when 'Yes', otherwise all products are available

showDatestamp.label: Show Datestamp
showDatestamp.comment: (default is 'Yes') - Configures whether the datestamp displays on the pinboard. Note the datestamp always displays on the modal detail view

showCaption.label: Show Caption
showCaption.comment: (default is 'Yes') - Configures whether the caption displays on the pinboard. Note the caption always displays on the modal detail view

minCaptionCharCount.label: Minimum Caption Character Count
minCaptionCharCount.comment: (default value is 0) - Only show media items with this many characters or more in the caption

minCaptionWordCount.label: Minimum Caption Word Count
minCaptionWordCount.comment: (default value is 0) - Only show media items with this many words or more in the caption

maxCaptionLength.label: Maximum Caption Length
maxCaptionLength.comment: (default value is 85) - max length of caption text characters to display. ends with ellipsis (...)

nameMaxLength.label: Maximum Name Length
nameMaxLength.comment: (default value is 255) - The maximum length of the user's name, after which displays an ellipsis (...)

sortOrder.label: Sort Order
sortOrder.comment: (default value is 0) - Options are '0' to sort by the most recent or '1' to sort by the most upvotes

limit.label: Limit
limit.comment: (default value is 20) - The maximum number of product boxes to be displayed on page load. The remaining product boxes will be loaded in batches equal to the limit

progressiveLoading.label: Progressive Loading
progressiveLoading.comment: (default is 'Yes') - When set to 'Yes' any remaining available content beyond the set limit will load once the user gets to the bottom of the page. If set to 'No' a 'load more' button will display instead

hSpacing.label: Horizontal Spacing (in pixels)
hSpacing.comment: (default value is 8) - Used for horizontal spacing between items. Value is in pixels

vSpacing.label: Vertical Spacing (in pixels)
vSpacing.comment: (default value is 8) - Used for vertical spacing between items. Value is in pixels

ccpinboard.label: TurnTo Checkout Comments Pinboard
ccpinboard.comment: The Checkout Comments Pinboard is located: <basedir>/pinboard/checkoutcomments

title.label: Title
title.comment: (default is "Customer Comments") - Title displayed at the top of the widget

skus.label: SKUs
skus.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more SKU(s) and/or Category(ies); Must be set as a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['category1','sku1','sku2']

brands.label: Brands
brands.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more brand(s); Must be a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['brand1']

tags.label: Tags
tags.comment: Allows you to filter displayed content by one or more tag code(s); Must be a valid Javascript array, e.g. ['tagcode1','tagcode2']

activeOnly.label: Active Only
activeOnly.comment: (default is No) - Only returns content for active products when 'Yes', otherwise all products are available

includeSyndicated.label: Include Syndicated
includeSyndicated.comment: (default is No) - Whether to include content from syndication partners

titleMaxLength.label: Max Title Length
titleMaxLength.comment: (default value is 255) - The maximum length of the product title, after which displays an ellipsis (...)

maxDaysOld.label: Max Days Old
maxDaysOld.comment: (default value is 30) - The maximum days old a comment can be and still appear in the product box. A value of -1 specifies means all comments should be included, regardless of age

maxCommentsPerBox.label: Maximum Comments per Box
maxCommentsPerBox.comment: (default value is 5) - The maximum number of comments that should be displayed in each product box

nameMaxLength.label: Maximum Name Length
nameMaxLength.comment: (default value is 255) - The maximum length of the user's name, after which displays an ellipsis (...)

commentMaxLength.label: Maximum Comment Length
commentMaxLength.comment: (default value is 200) - The maximum length of text characters to display. ends with ellipsis (...)

limit.label: Limit
limit.comment: (default value is 20) - The maximum number of product boxes to be displayed on page load. The remaining product boxes will be loaded in batches equal to the limit

progressiveLoading.label: Progressive Loading
progressiveLoading.comment: (default is 'Yes') - When set to 'Yes' any remaining available content beyond the set limit will load once the user gets to the bottom of the page. If set to 'No' a 'load more' button will display instead

hSpacing.label: Horizontal Spacing (in pixels)
hSpacing.comment: (default value is 8) - Used for horizontal spacing between items. Value is in pixels

vSpacing.label: Vertical Spacing (in pixels)
vSpacing.comment: (default value is 8) - Used for vertical spacing between items. Value is in pixels

mobileconfig.label: TurnTo Mobile Configuration
mobileconfig.comment: The default mobile landing page URL is <baseurl>/turntomobile

enabled.label: Enabled Historical Orders Feed Push
enabled.comment: When set to Yes, Turnto historical orders feed will be pushed to TurnTo nightly.

enabled.label: Enabled Catalog Feed Feed Push
enabled.comment: When set to Yes, a TurnTo catalog feed will be pushed to TurnTo nightly.
